definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.chinese: 象鼻蟲的身體是擰起來的。

sentences.english: Sometimes it was full of maggots and weevils.
sentences.chinese: 有時，餅乾裏生滿了蛆和象鼻蟲。

sentences.english: Farm demonstration work in the South helped to fight the cotton boll weevil .
sentences.chinese: 南部農場示範工作大大幫助了對棉花象鼻蟲的防治。

sentences.english: Haul that weevil to his feet.
sentences.chinese: 用象鼻蟲把他的腳綁起來。
